CREATE TABLE ruleform.access_authorization ( id bigserial NOT NULL, product1 bigint, agency1 bigint, location1 bigint, attribute1 bigint, coordinate1 bigint, interval1 bigint, relationship1 bigint, status_code1 bigint, unit1 bigint, authorization_type character varying NOT NULL, relationship bigint NOT NULL, product2 bigint, agency2 bigint, location2 bigint, attribute2 bigint, coordinate2 bigint, interval2 bigint, relationship2 bigint, status_code2 bigint, unit2 bigint, parent_transitive_relationship bigint, child_transitive_relationship bigint, description character varying, notes character varying, updated_by bigint NOT NULL, update_date timestamp with time zone NOT NULL DEFAULT ('now'::text)::timestamp(6) with time zone,
CONSTRAINT access_authorization_pkey PRIMARY KEY (id ), CONSTRAINT access_authorization_product1_fkey FOREIGN KEY (product1) REFERENCES ruleform.product (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE NO ACTION DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT access_authorization_agency1_fkey FOREIGN KEY (agency1) REFERENCES ruleform.agency (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE NO ACTION DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT access_authorization_location1_fkey FOREIGN KEY (location1) REFERENCES ruleform.location (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE NO ACTION DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT access_authorization_attribute1_fkey FOREIGN KEY (attribute1) REFERENCES ruleform.attribute (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE NO ACTION DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT access_authorization_coordinate1_fkey FOREIGN KEY (coordinate1) REFERENCES ruleform.coordinate (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE NO ACTION DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT access_authorization_interval1_fkey FOREIGN KEY (interval1) REFERENCES ruleform.interval (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE NO ACTION DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT access_authorization_relationship1_fkey FOREIGN KEY (relationship1) REFERENCES ruleform.relationship (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE NO ACTION DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT access_authorization_status_code1_fkey FOREIGN KEY (status_code1) REFERENCES ruleform.status_code (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE NO ACTION DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT access_authorization_unit1_fkey FOREIGN KEY (unit1) REFERENCES ruleform.unit (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE NO ACTION DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT access_authorization_relationship_fkey FOREIGN KEY (relationship) REFERENCES ruleform.relationship (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE NO ACTION DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT access_authorization_product2_fkey FOREIGN KEY (product2) REFERENCES ruleform.product (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE NO ACTION DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT access_authorization_agency2_fkey FOREIGN KEY (agency2) REFERENCES ruleform.agency (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE NO ACTION DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT access_authorization_location2_fkey FOREIGN KEY (location2) REFERENCES ruleform.location (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE NO ACTION DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT access_authorization_attribute2_fkey FOREIGN KEY (attribute2) REFERENCES ruleform.attribute (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE NO ACTION DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT access_authorization_coordinate2_fkey FOREIGN KEY (coordinate2) REFERENCES ruleform.coordinate (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE NO ACTION DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT access_authorization_interval2_fkey FOREIGN KEY (interval2) REFERENCES ruleform.interval (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE NO ACTION DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT access_authorization_relationship2_fkey FOREIGN KEY (relationship2) REFERENCES ruleform.relationship (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE NO ACTION DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT access_authorization_status_code2_fkey FOREIGN KEY (status_code2) REFERENCES ruleform.status_code (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE NO ACTION DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT access_authorization_unit2_fkey FOREIGN KEY (unit2) REFERENCES ruleform.unit (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE NO ACTION DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT access_authorization_updated_by_fkey FOREIGN KEY (updated_by) REFERENCES ruleform.agency (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE NO ACTION DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT access_authorization_parent_relationship_fkey FOREIGN KEY (parent_transitive_relationship) REFERENCES ruleform.relationship (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE NO ACTION DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT access_authorization_child_relationship_fkey FOREIGN KEY (child_transitive_relationship) REFERENCES ruleform.relationship (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE NO ACTION DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT access_authorization_one_parent CHECK (ruleform.null_zero(product1) + ruleform.null_zero(agency1) + ruleform.null_zero(location1) = 1), CONSTRAINT access_authorization_one_child CHECK (ruleform.null_zero(product2) + ruleform.null_zero(agency2) + ruleform.null_zero(location2) = 1) ) WITH ( OIDS=FALSE ); COMMENT ON TABLE ruleform.access_authorization IS 'Authorizations to join networks of ruleforms';
